name: Create Airtable records from new Circle members
description:
This template periodically checks for new members in Circle and uses the retrieved information to create new records in Airtable.

Your Airtable table should have at least these columns:
1) Email as email (as a primary column)
2) Name as short line text

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
